targets.query: SELECT SUM("qps") AS "aggregte-qps" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("requests-received"), 1s) AS "qps" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM("qps") AS "aggregte-qps" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("requests-received"), 1s) AS "qps" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE "host-name" != '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("requests-received"), 1s) AS "qps" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE "host-name" != '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT SUM("qps") AS "aggregate-qps" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("requests-received"), 1s) AS "qps" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE "host-name" = '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("requests-received"), 1s) AS "qps" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE "host-name" = '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)

rows.title: CS 7.1.0 QPS (Only needed for old data)

targets.query: SELECT SUM("lps") AS "aggregate-lookups" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("lookups"), 1s) AS "lps" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM("rsps") AS "requests-sent" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("requests-sent"), 1s) AS "rsps" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM("rrps") AS "responses-received" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("responses-received"), 1s) AS "rrps" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM("rlq") AS "rate-limited-requests" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("rate-limited-requests"), 1s) AS "rlq" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM("mrd") AS "malformed-requests-dropped" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("malformed-requests-dropped"), 1s) AS "mrd" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM("fld") AS "formerr-loop-dropped" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("formerr-loop-dropped"), 1s) AS "fld" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM("sdq") AS "suppressed-duplicate-queries" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("suppressed-duplicate-queries"), 1s) AS "sdq" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM("nv") AS "no-view" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("requests-no-view"), 1s) AS "nv" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM("rc") AS "recursion-contexts-in-use" FROM (SELECT min("recursion-contexts-in-use") AS "rc" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM("tca") AS "tcp-connections-accepted" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("tcp-connections-accepted"), 1s) AS "tca" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM("tcr") AS "tcp-connections-rejected" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("tcp-connections-rejected"), 1s) AS "tcr" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM("tc") AS "tcp-clients" FROM (SELECT min("tcp-clients") AS "tc" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM("trs") AS "tcp-requests-sent" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("tcp-requests-sent"), 1s) AS "trs" FROM "cacheserve.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT (SUM("prefetch-extensions")) AS "prefetch-extensions" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("prefetch-extensions"), 1s) AS "prefetch-extensions" FROM "cacheserve.resolver.statistics" WHERE "key" = 'pm-resolver' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("prefetch-extensions"), 1s) AS "prefetch-extensions" FROM "cacheserve.resolver.statistics" WHERE "host-name" != '' AND "key" != 'world' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name", "key" fill(null)

panels.title: Prefetch-Extension Rate on pm-resolver by Host

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("provisioning.update-count"), 1s) AS "update rate" FROM "cacheserve.layer.status" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

panels.title: Cacheserve Provisioning Update Rate by host-name

targets.query: SELECT (min("provisioning.current-time") - min("provisioning.last-update")) AS "update lag" FROM "cacheserve.layer.status" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

panels.title: Cacheserve Provisioning Update Time Lag by host-name

targets.query: SELECT SUM("rps") AS "queries-per-second" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("rcode-value"), 1s) AS "rps" FROM "cacheserve.resolver.statistics" WHERE "host-name" != '' AND "key" = 'pm-resolver' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name", rcode fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval), rcode fill(null)

panels.title: Aggregate pm-resolver Response Rate by rcode

rows.title: Aggregate pm-resolver Response Rate by rcode (expensive query)

targets.query: SELECT min("memory-in-use") AS "memory" FROM "cacheserve.server.usage" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)
SELECT version, max("num-cpus") AS "num-cpus" FROM "cacheserve.server.information" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host-name","node-id"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("provisioning.update-count"), 1s) AS "update rate" FROM "cacheserve.layer.status" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)

panels.title: Cacheserve Provisioning Update Rate by node-id (only needed for old data)

targets.query: SELECT (min("provisioning.current-time") - min("provisioning.last-update")) AS "update lag" FROM "cacheserve.layer.status" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)

panels.title: Cacheserve Provisioning Update Time Lag by node-id (only needed for old data)
